Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui

Class Gui

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui.Gui
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Ui, java.lang.Runnable
    public class Gui
extends java.lang.Object
implements Ui, java.lang.Runnable
    This class manages Graphical User Interface as User Interface.

      • showMessage

        public java.lang.String showMessage​(java.lang.String toBeShown,
                                    java.util.List<java.lang.String> possibleAnswers,
                                    boolean isAnswerRequired)
        Shows a message coming from server on the window.
        Specified by:
        showMessage in interface Ui
        Parameters:
        toBeShown - is a string represent a question or a statement
        possibleAnswers - is the list of the possible answers that user can choose
        isAnswerRequired - specify if an answer is required (the message is a question) or not (the message is a notice)
        Returns:
        the user's answer or a reception acknowledgement
